channel.title: Smf?
channel.description:
Hi, Im not sure if this is the right section but w/e,
Ive been trying to make a smf forum website for my server. If anyones ever had a smf web or anyone who has alot of experiense with smf please help and tell me how to make a smf website =].
Thanks, Reforced

item.title: Smf?
item.dc:creator: @infestor1 infestor1
item.description:
@infestor1 wrote:

WAY 1 - really customizable

  1. Get a web hosting service. Make sure it has MySQL and PHP installed.
  2. Download the latest version of SMF from SMF.org.
  3. Unzip the file and upload the files to your web host (or webserver, hosting on your own computer is reccomended.
  4. Go to http://yourdomain.com/forumdirectory/install.php.
  5. put in the information.
  6. submit it.
  7. fill in the information.
  8. submit it.
  9. your forum should be setup!

way 2 - not so customizable

  1. go to smfforfree.com
  2. make a forum there.

Read full topic
